name: AnimalRescue
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: panda rescue
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With multiple interactive stories to choose from, Animal Rescue offers fun, engaging adventures for ages five and older. Children and families first select an animal to rescue, and then the journey begins!

INTERACTIVE STORIES
--Panda Rescue-- (10 levels)
You’ve just been accepted as a volunteer for the Panda Wilderness School, which is a Conservation and Research Center for the Giant Panda in Wolong, China. They’ve just rescued an orphaned baby panda from the forest, and you are the assigned caretaker! Your job is to keep your baby panda healthy as it develops from a baby to an adult, and to teach it important life skills so it can be released back into the wild when it’s grown up.

--Tiger Rescue-- (13 levels)
You've been chosen to travel to Chitwan National Park in Nepal to learn how to help Bengal tigers. While you're there, you'll stay at the home of a young park ranger named Dhanvi. Your job will be to watch and protect one of the tigers in the park. You'll follow your tiger as it grows from a tiny baby into a strong, proud adult. You'll learn about all the things your tiger needs to survive, and help them as they face the challenges of growing up in a jungle.

--Turtle Rescue-- (14 levels)
You've been invited to join the Archie Carr Center for Sea Turtle Research in Florida, as they try to learn more about the life of sea turtles. On this adventure across the Atlantic Ocean, you’ll explore oceans and beaches, learn how to scuba dive, meet some of the world’s strangest animals, and make friends along the way. Your baby turtle is named Finn -- unlock this story to discover whether baby Finn is a boy or girl, and start your adventures in the sea!

--Penguin Rescue--
Coming soon!

TIPS FOR PARENTS
Each story has between 10 and 14 levels. We recommend playing one or two levels at a time, which provides an engaging 10-minute interaction.

If you don’t hear the prompt, just say “repeat.”

All of our adventures involve the concept of conservation, to help build awareness of the importance of protecting our planet and vulnerable species.

Content is suitable for ages five and older.

FEEDBACK
We hope you find Animal Rescue to be a delightful experience. If you have feedback or suggestions on how to make the adventures more enjoyable, please contact us at info@matchbox.io.
